availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Pendleton Sisk (Hopkins co., Ky, merchan'ts clerk + grocery keeper )

body.p: Hopkins County, Kentucky, merchant's clerk and grocery keeper. South Carolina native. Married to Nancy Sisk. Father of Willis Sisk, Sarah Sisk, Mary Sisk, and Susan Sisk. Merchant's clerk in Hopkins County, Kentucky, in 1850. Grocery keeper in Madisonville in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Hopkins County, District 1, p. 51B.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Hopkins County, Madisonville, p. 830.
"P. Sisk (1798-1875)," Find A Grave, Memorial #67390142, accessed July 22, 2021, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/67390142.
